[xule:error] Rule: DQC.US.0005.49 - Error while processing factset aspect. Concept {http://fasb.org/us-gaap/2019-01-31}StatementScenarioAxis not found. - smid-20181231.xml

[DQC.US.0015.647] us-gaap:DeferredTaxLiabilitiesPropertyPlantAndEquipment has a value of -5,000 which is less than zero. This element should not have a negative value. The preparer should consider if the value is input correctly for this assertion and, after considering the appropriateness of the input, if incorrect, input the amount as a positive (i.e., absolute) value and provide a negated label.
The properties of this us-gaap:DeferredTaxLiabilitiesPropertyPlantAndEquipment fact are: Period :2017-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : USD Rule version: 9.0.0RC1 - https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/924719/000165495419003343/smid-20181231.xml 1695

property.name: label
property.value: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Property, Plant and Equipment

entry.message: [xule:error] Rule: DQC.US.0067.7644 - Error while processing factset aspect. Concept {http://fasb.org/us-gaap/2019-01-31}StatementScenarioAxis not found. - smid-20181231.xml

[DQC.US.0047.7481] In the company's extension taxonomy the concept Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities includes us-gaap:AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsReceivablePeriodIncreaseDecrease as a summation-child. The concept us-gaap:AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsReceivablePeriodIncreaseDecrease should not appear as a child of NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActivities because it does not have a balance type. Increase (Decrease) items without balance attributes are used in a roll forward and should not be used in the cash flow statement as they represent the impact on the balance sheet item which is the opposite of the impact on cash.
Rule Element Id:7481 Rule version: 9.0.0RC1 -
